St. Nicholas is a municipality that holds community status in Prince Edward Island, Canada. It was incorporated in 1991.
Demographics
}}
In the 2021 Census of Population conducted by Statistics Canada, St. Nicholas had a population of  living in  of its  total private dwellings, a change of |213|1}} from its 2016 population of . With a land area of , it had a population density of  in 2021.
